participant_1.name: Emily Johnson
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and nurturing, Emily finds joy in small moments and values family above all.
participant_1.background: I collect memories of my accomplishments. I don't feel fulfilled in my life and need to express myself more. I snuggle up with my cat and read Anne of Green Gables. I have three daughters. I remember my dad taking me fishing in the pond on his property.

participant_2.name: James Carter
participant_2.personality: Energetic and driven, James is passionate about animals and enjoys an active lifestyle, but he also carries the weight of past losses.
participant_2.background: I love to be active and look my best, but I can get sad when I lose a loved one. I work as a veterinarian. I own four German Shepherds. I like meat too much. After quitting my job, I devoted my time to raising and selling pigs.

content.text: Great!  I'm a veterinarian, but I quit my job to raise and sell pigs.
Wow! How'd you get into that?
I always loved animals, especially pigs. I collect memories of my accomplishments, and one of my favorite is when I raised a piglet that won first place at a county fair.
That's so cool! I'm a stay-at-home mom with three daughters. I love to read and snuggle up with my cat.
Sounds like you have a lot of fun! What are your favorite books to read?
I love to read anything by L.M. Montgomery. Her books are so peaceful and relaxing. I especially like Anne of Green Gables.
I've never read any of her books, but I've heard good things about them. Maybe I'll check them out.
You should! I'm sure you'd enjoy them.
I'm also a big fan of meat. I think it's the best food on earth.
I'm not a vegetarian, but I don't eat a lot of meat. I'm more of a pescatarian.
That's cool. I have four German Shepherds, and they love meat. I'm always feeding them.
I love dogs! I grew up with a German Shepherd, and he was the best dog ever.
They're the best dogs! So loyal and loving.
